glosses: a neighbourhood in Seferihisar district, İzmir Province, Turkey

etymology: Inherited from Ottoman Turkish صیغهجق (sığacık). According to Nishanyan, the placename could derive from Ancient Greek σιγαλεός (sigaleós, “silent, still”), in reference to its naturally protected harbour. This is the site of the ancient city of Τέως (Téōs).
